reviewText: I bought this box set and discovered that it's the same size as a DVD box!  Not very well put together.  If you want a good copy, look for the Special Edition, only $19 and it's the same size as a blu-ray.
It arrived perfectly and works fine.

Pretty nice boxed set. Not a mega fan of the Batman franchise, but I have been wanting to watch Batman Begins and The Dark Knight. For the price, you cannot resist this set especially for it being Blu Ray.
